name: Funky Monkey
description: Funky Monkey is a euphoric indica-dominant cross between Grape Ape and Mendo Purps. Its giggly, talkative qualities pair well with social outings or chumming with friends at home.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Tingly, Happy, Sleepy, Euphoric, Pain, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Stress, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid
